Hiding the Legend

# Learn about API authentication here: /julia/getting-started
# Find your api_key here: /settings/api

using Plotly


trace1 = [
  "x" => [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8], 
  "y" => [0, 3, 6, 4, 5, 2, 3, 5, 4], 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
trace2 = [
  "x" => [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8], 
  "y" => [0, 4, 7, 8, 3, 6, 3, 3, 4], 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
data = [trace1, trace2]
layout = ["showlegend" => false]
response = Plotly.plot(data, ["layout" => layout, "filename" => "legend-visibility", "fileopt" => "overwrite"])
plot_url = response["url"]

Legend Names

# Learn about API authentication here: /julia/getting-started
# Find your api_key here: /settings/api

using Plotly


trace1 = [
  "x" => [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8], 
  "y" => [0, 3, 6, 4, 5, 2, 3, 5, 4], 
  "name" => "Blue Trace", 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
trace2 = [
  "x" => [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8], 
  "y" => [0, 4, 7, 8, 3, 6, 3, 3, 4], 
  "name" => "Orange Trace", 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
data = [trace1, trace2]
response = Plotly.plot(data, ["filename" => "legend-labels", "fileopt" => "overwrite"])
plot_url = response["url"]

Positioning the Legend Inside the Plot

# Learn about API authentication here: /julia/getting-started
# Find your api_key here: /settings/api

using Plotly


trace1 = [
  "x" => [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8], 
  "y" => [0, 3, 6, 4, 5, 2, 3, 5, 4], 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
trace2 = [
  "x" => [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8], 
  "y" => [0, 4, 7, 8, 3, 6, 3, 3, 4], 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
data = [trace1, trace2]
layout = [
  "showlegend" => true, 
  "legend" => [
    "x" => 1, 
    "y" => 1
  ]
]
response = Plotly.plot(data, ["layout" => layout, "filename" => "legend-inside", "fileopt" => "overwrite"])
plot_url = response["url"]

Positioning the Legend Outside the Plot

# Learn about API authentication here: /julia/getting-started
# Find your api_key here: /settings/api

using Plotly


trace1 = [
  "x" => [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8], 
  "y" => [0, 3, 6, 4, 5, 2, 3, 5, 4], 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
trace2 = [
  "x" => [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8], 
  "y" => [0, 4, 7, 8, 3, 6, 3, 3, 4], 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
data = [trace1, trace2]
layout = [
  "showlegend" => true, 
  "legend" => [
    "x" => 100, 
    "y" => 1
  ]
]
response = Plotly.plot(data, ["layout" => layout, "filename" => "legend-outside", "fileopt" => "overwrite"])
plot_url = response["url"]

Styling and Coloring the Legend

# Learn about API authentication here: /julia/getting-started
# Find your api_key here: /settings/api

using Plotly


trace1 = [
  "x" => [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8], 
  "y" => [0, 3, 6, 4, 5, 2, 3, 5, 4], 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
trace2 = [
  "x" => [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8], 
  "y" => [0, 4, 7, 8, 3, 6, 3, 3, 4], 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
data = [trace1, trace2]
layout = ["legend" => [
    "x" => 0, 
    "y" => 1, 
    "traceorder" => "normal", 
    "font" => [
      "family" => "sans-serif", 
      "size" => 12, 
      "color" => "#000"
    ], 
    "bgcolor" => "#E2E2E2", 
    "bordercolor" => "#FFFFFF", 
    "borderwidth" => 2
  ]]
response = Plotly.plot(data, ["layout" => layout, "filename" => "legend-style", "fileopt" => "overwrite"])
plot_url = response["url"]

Hiding Legend Entries

# Learn about API authentication here: {{BASE_URL}}/julia/getting-started
# Find your api_key here: {{BASE_URL}}/settings/api

using Plotly


trace1 = [
  "x" => [0, 1, 2], 
  "y" => [1, 2, 3], 
  "name" => "First Trace", 
  "showlegend" => false, 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
trace2 = [
  "x" => [0, 1, 2, 3], 
  "y" => [8, 4, 2, 0], 
  "name" => "Second Trace", 
  "showlegend" => true, 
  "type" => "scatter"
]
data = [trace1, trace2]
response = Plotly.plot(data, ["filename" => "show-legend", "fileopt" => "overwrite"])
plot_url = response["url"]
Plotly

Plotly is the easiest and fastest way to graph and share your data online.
